name: Rolando RUIZ, applicant, v. Lorie DAVIS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Rolando RUIZ, applicant,
v.
Lorie DAVIS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division.
attorneys: Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied.
casebody.head_matter:
Rolando RUIZ, applicant,
v.
Lorie DAVIS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division.
No. 16-8135 (16A858).
Supreme Court of the United States
March 7, 2017.
Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied.
